sentence.name: CtrlSearchValuesSearchResultListboxScreenReader

sentence.name: CtrlSearchValuesAddToVariableSelector

sentence.name: CtrlSearchValuesUserManualScreenReader
sentence.value: The 'Advanced search' screen is used to search in long lists that contain over 1500 values. You can choose to fetch all values, or search for single values. If you use the search function, all matches will appear in a list where you can select one or more of the matches. (The selected values are displayed at the bottom of the screen. If you have selected too many, you can unmark these values and remove them.) You can repeat the search as many times as you want before returning to the main page with the selected values.

sentence.name: CtrlSearchValuesSearchFieldScreenReader
sentence.value: Enter search key, code or description

sentence.name: CtrlTableQueryShowInformationTooltip
sentence.value: Get information about how you can connect to this table from your application

sentence.name: CtrlTableQueryInformationText
sentence.value: POST the following JSON query to the URL below to access this table from your application.

sentence.name: CtrlTableQueryV2InformationText
sentence.value: Send a GET request to the URL below to access this table.

sentence.name: CtrlNavigationFlowExplainScreenReader

sentence.name: CtrlSaveQueryChoosetimeperiodInformation

sentence.name: CtrlSaveQueryTimeWarning
sentence.value: It is not possible to choose to update the query, because the time periods have been combined manually

sentence.name: CtrlSaveQueryNoTimeValWarning
sentence.value: It is not possible to update the query since there is no defined time variable in this table.

sentence.name: CtrlSaveQuerySelectedTimePeriod
sentence.value: Don't update the query, but show the same time periods as selected

sentence.name: CtrlSaveQueryExtendedTimePeriod
sentence.value: Update the query with a fixed starting time point and the new time periods

sentence.name: CtrlSaveQueryURLInfo

sentence.name: MasterPageSaveQueryInfoFromTime

sentence.value: User manual for select values from group.

sentence.name: CtrlSelectFromGroupSelectUserManualScreenReader
sentence.value: The 'Select values from group' screen can be used for variables where the values are grouped. You must first select grouping and then group. You can choose to display the single values in the group or (in some tables) aggregated values, before returning to the main page.

sentence.name: CtrlSelectFromGroupGroupsScreenReader

sentence.name: PxcPermilUnitVarExists

sentence.name: PageViewDataSortDescription

sentence.name: PageViewDataSortCopyInstructions

sentence.name: PageViewDataSortColumnIsUnsortedSR
sentence.value: The table is sorted on another column. Click to sort ascending on {0} .

sentence.name: PageViewDataSortColumnIsSortedAscSR

sentence.name: PageViewDataSortColumnIsSortedDescSR

sentence.name: PxWebMenuExplanation
sentence.value: (C)=county, (M)=municipality, (BU)=Basic statistical unit, (UD)=urban district, (US)=urban settlement. Character in brackets shows the lowest regional level.

sentence.name: PxWebMarkingTipsHeader
sentence.value: Tip on how to mark in a list box

sentence.name: PxWebMarkingTipsText
sentence.value:
At least one indication in every list box has to be made to show a result for each variable. When you wish to see one or a few variables, mark these only. N.B. To undo a mark, press the button CTRL and click the mouse button on the text.
To select all lines in a list box: - Mark the first line in the list box. Then press the buttons SHIFT and END simultaneously.
To select/undo a marked line in a list box: - Press the button CTRL and click the left mouse button on the selected line simultaneously.
To select more than one line in a list box: - Mark lines in a row by pressing the left mouse button and slip it over the requested lines. Or, mark the first line on your list and then press the button SHIFT at the same time as you press the up or down arrows on the keyboard. - Mark lines, not in a row, by pressing the button CTRL at the same time as you click the left mouse button on the requested lines.
To search for a specific value in the list box: - Mark the first line in the list box. Then type the first letter in the line requested. If you fail in getting the right line, try the typing again until you find the right value. Or use the up or down arrows or the mouse button to look further.

sentence.name: PxWebTableUserSettingsLegend
sentence.value: Which rows are to be displayed?

sentence.name: PxWebTableUserSettingsZeroOptionNoZeroAndNil
sentence.value: Hide rows with only zeros or '-'

sentence.name: PxWebTableUserSettingsZeroOptionNoZeroNilAndSymbol
sentence.value: Hide rows with only zeros, '-' or dots

sentence.name: PxWebChartPieChartInformation
sentence.value: A pie chart can only contain one variable with more than one value. Use the 'Delete variable' or the 'Delete value' operations in the 'Edit and calculate' menu above to remove variables and values.

sentence.name: PxWebChartPyramidChartInformation
sentence.value: For the population pyramid, one of the variables have an unlimited number of values. One of the other variables must have two values, while the rest of the variables may only have one value. Eg variable age can have all its values ​​and the variable sex has two values.

sentence.name: PxWebChartTooManyValuesInformation
sentence.value: You have selected too many values.

sentence.name: PxWebTableCropped
sentence.value: Maximum of {0} rows and {1} columns can be displayed on screen.

sentence.name: PxWebSavedQueryUnsafeMessage
sentence.value: The text in the table differs from the original in the database, because it has been changed manually

sentence.name: PxWebGeneralErrorMessage
sentence.value: An error has occurred. The error has been registered

sentence.name: PxWebSavedQueryExecuteErrorMessage
sentence.value: Your saved query can not be found. The table can have been moved or removed.

sentence.name: PxWebMetadataNoVariableMeta
sentence.value: There is no definition for this variable

sentence.name: PxWebMetadataNoValueMeta
sentence.value: There are no values with definitions

sentence.name: PxWebSkipToMainContentLinkScreenReader
sentence.value: Press enter to go directly to main content

sentence.name: PxWebSkipToSelectionLinkScreenReader
sentence.value: Now you have come to the page, Choose variable. This page give you the oportunity to select which variables and values you want to display in your result of the table. A variable is a property of a statistical unit. The page is divided into several boxes, one for each variable, where you can select values by click to highlight one or more values. It always starts with the statistics variable which is the main value counted in the table.

sentence.name: UserManualScreenReader_Databases_Text
sentence.value: This page is for selecting the database where your want to seach for a table.

sentence.name: UserManualScreenReader_Menu_Text
sentence.value: You are now in the first main page of PxWeb, where the goal is to select a table. You may find your table by seach or by drilling down in the menu three.

sentence.name: UserManualScreenReader_Result_Text
sentence.value: This page shows the results of the figures you selected on the variable-page in PxWeb. On this result-page you can download the numbers in another format, pivot or edit them. You can also save them as a saved query, which can be sent to others or used as a link the next time you want to see these numbers with new time periods.

sentence.name: PxWebLoginMissingUserOrPassw
sentence.value: Userid and password must be filled in

sentence.name: PxWebSwitchToCompactViewScreenReader
sentence.value: Changes visual layout. In the list view a single variable box utilizes the entire screen width. In the compact view there are many boxes per line. Now displaying list view.

sentence.name: PxWebSwitchToListViewScreenReader
sentence.value: Changes visual layout. In the list view a single variable box utilizes the entire screen width. In the compact view there are many boxes per line. Now displaying compact view.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsDatabasesPxDatabasesInfo
sentence.value: Selected PX Databases will be displayed in PxWeb

sentence.value: Selected CNMM Databases will be displayed in PxWeb

sentence.value: Do you want to create a new search index?

sentence.value: Path to directory containing the language files

sentence.value: Path to directory containing the images

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPathsPxDatabasePathInfo
sentence.value: Path to directory containing the PX databases

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPathsAggregationPathInfo
sentence.value: Path to directory containing the aggregation files

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsFileFormatsCellLimitDownloadInfo
sentence.value: Max number of downloadable cells in resulting table

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsFileFormatsFileBaseNameInfo
sentence.value: Get filename from matrix or table id when a file is downloaded, for exemple to Excel, csv. To create a unique file name, the file name is concatenated with date and time.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsFileFormatsExcelInformationLevelInfo
sentence.value: Controls which information that are displayed in the Excel file

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsFileFormatsExcelDoubleColumnInfo
sentence.value: If code always shall be displayed in a separate column

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalSecrecyOptionInfo
sentence.value: If data values should be obfuscated when displayed

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalRoundingRuleInfo
sentence.value: Type of rounding rule ('Bankers rounding' or 'Round up')

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalSymbol1Info
sentence.value: Text to display for measures having Data Symbol1

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalSymbol2Info
sentence.value: Text to display for measures having Data Symbol2

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalSymbol3Info
sentence.value: Text to display for measures having Data Symbol3

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalSymbol4Info
sentence.value: Text to display for measures having Data Symbol4

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalSymbol5Info
sentence.value: Text to display for measures having Data Symbol5

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalSymbol6Info
sentence.value: Text to display for measures having Data Symbol6

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalDataSymbolNilInfo
sentence.value: Text to display for measures having Data Symbol NIL

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalDataSymbolSumInfo
sentence.value: Text to display for measures having Data Symbol Sum

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalShowSourceDescriptionInfo
sentence.value: If source description shall be displayed for table or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalTableInformationLevelInfo
sentence.value: Controls which information that are displayed for the table

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalUpperCaseInfo
sentence.value: Rule for making the first character in a value name uppercase

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalDataNotePlacementInfo
sentence.value: Specifies placement of datanotes. Datanotes can be placed before or after values

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalRemoveSingleContentInfo
sentence.value: Remove the content variable if it contains only one value

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalStrictAggregationCheckInfo
sentence.value: If strict check of aggregation files will be performed or not. If set to yes the aggregation files (.agg) must have the keyword 'valueset' set to the name of the current valueset, if it is not a match the aggregation will not be added.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalShowInformationTypesInfo
sentence.value: Which Information types that shall be displayed in the information of the table

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsGlobalDetailedInformationInfo
sentence.value: Should a link to the infofile be displayed. If the metadata are displayed as links a link to the infofile will appear next to the footnotes link. If metadata shall appear in tabs the link to the infofile will appear under the information section in the About table tab. The link to the infofile is only shown on the selection page.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsAdministrationUseIPFilterInfo
sentence.value: If IP filter shall be used when logging in to the administration pages or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsAdministrationIPAddressesInfo
sentence.value: List of IP addresses with permission to access the administration pages. This setting is only valid if the setting 'Use IP filter' is set to true.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuMenuModeInfo
sentence.value: Controls how the menu is displayed

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowRootInfo
sentence.value: Shall the root node be displayed or not?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuExpandAllInfo
sentence.value: Shall the tree be expanded or collapsed?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuSortByAliasInfo
sentence.value: Shall the nodes be sorted by their alias names or not?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowSelectionLinkInfo
sentence.value: Shall the link to the page where the user can Select variables and variables be displayed or not?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowDownloadLinkInfo
sentence.value: Shall the link where the user can download the table as a file be displayed or not?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuViewLinkModeInfo
sentence.value: Mode for the view-link. Can have one of three different values: 'Default values' = Default values are displayed in a table when the user clicks the link. 'All values' = All values are shown within a table when the user clicks the link. 'Hidden' = The link is not displayed.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuNumberOfValuesInDefaultViewInfo
sentence.value: Maximum number of values that are selected when Viewlink mode = 'Default values'. Values are preselected rather than allowing the users to select variables and values by themselves.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowModifiedDateInfo
sentence.value: Defines if information about when the PX-file was last updated in the file system shall be displayed in PxWeb or not.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowLastUpdatedInfo
sentence.value: Defines if LAST-UPDATED in the PX-files shall be displayed in PxWeb or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowFileSizeInfo
sentence.value: If information about the filesize shall be displayed or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowTableCategoryInfo
sentence.value: If information about the table category shall be displayed or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowTableUpdatedAfterPublishInfo
sentence.value: If tables that has been updated after they was published shall be marked in the menu or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowVariablesAndValuesInfo
sentence.value: If information about variables and values within the table shall be displayed or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuMetadataAsIconsInfo
sentence.value: If table metadata shall be displayed as icons after the table name. If set to 'Yes' icons will be displayed. If set to 'No' metadata will be dsipalyed as text.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowMenuExplanationInfo
sentence.value: Choose if menu explanation will be shown. If set to 'Yes' menu explanation will be shown. If set to 'No' menu explanation will not be shown.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowTextToMetadata
sentence.value: If a explanation shall be displayd next to the metadata

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMenuShowTextToMetadataInfo
sentence.value: Show a explanatory text relevant to table metadata. For example, if set to 'Yes' the text 'Modified' is inserted before the table metadata modified date, if set to 'No' the table metadata is shown but no describing text.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionCellLimitScreenInfo
sentence.value: The maximum number of cells that can be displayed on screen

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionShowMandatoryMarkInfo
sentence.value: If mandatory variables shall be marked or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionAllowAggregationsInfo
sentence.value: If aggregations of variable values shall be possible or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionShowHierarchiesInfo
sentence.value: If hierarchies shall be displayed or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionHierarchicalLevelsOpenInfo
sentence.value: Specifies how expanded (number of tree-levels) the hierarchy tree should be as default

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionShowMarkingTipsInfo
sentence.value: If marking tips shall be displayed or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionMarkingTipsURLInfo
sentence.value: URL to the webpage with marking tips

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionMaxRowsWithoutSearchInfo
sentence.value: Maximum values displayed for a variable in selection box. If the variable has more values the user must use the search function to select the values.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionAlwaysShowTimeVariableWithoutSearchInfo
sentence.value: Always show time variable without search even if number of values exceeds configured max rows without search.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionListSizeInfo
sentence.value: Number of rows (height) in the variable selector

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionShowSelectionLimitsInfo
sentence.value: If information about selection limits shall be displayed or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionOutputFormatsInfo
sentence.value: Selected output formats (presentation views and file formats) will be available for selection in PxWeb

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionValuesetMustBeSelectedFirstInfo
sentence.value: If the variable has valuesets the user have to select valueset before values can be selected when this settings is set to true

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionShowAllAvailableValuesSearchButtonInfo
sentence.value: Is the 'Show all available values' button in the search-view. Warning! settings this setting to true can result in big web pages that may be heavy to load.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionTitleFromMenuInfo
sentence.value: If set to true, the table title will be displayed as it was displayed in the menu

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionStandardApplicationHeadTitleInfo
sentence.value: If set to true, the table title will be standard fixed

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionMetadataAsLinksInfo
sentence.value: If About tables information (footnotes and information) shall be displayed as links or directly within the selection page as a tab.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionSelectValuesFromGroupInfo
sentence.value: If set to true, a button will be displayed in the variable selector. When the user clicks on this button a dialog will be displayed. In the dialog the user kan select values from singel or aggragated values.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionButtonsForContentVariableInfo
sentence.value: If buttons (Select all, deselect all, sort ascending...) shall be displayed for content variables or not.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionDefaultSearchInfo
sentence.value: Choose if search is set to free text or beginning of word.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionDefaultSearchBeginningOfWord
sentence.value: Only search from beginning of text

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionPreSelectFirstContentAndTimeInfo
sentence.value: Determines whether the first value for the statistical variable and time should be preselected

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionShowNoFootnoteForSelectionInfo
sentence.value: Determines whether text for missing footnotes should be displayed

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionSortVariableOrderInfo
sentence.value: If set to true, the variable order will be sorted so content, time and mandatory variables are displayed first

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionAlwaysShowCodeAndTextInAdvancedSearchResult
sentence.value: Always show code and text in search result

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionAlwaysShowCodeAndTextInAdvancedSearchResultInfo
sentence.value: If set to 'True', code and text will always be displayed in the advanced search result for variable values. If set to 'False', display of code and text will be determined by metadata.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsNavigationNavigationFlowVisibleInfo
sentence.value: Show Navigation flow below bread crumb. Displays the Select table, select the variable, show table

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSelectionSearchButtonModeInfo
sentence.value: Controls when the search values button shall be displayed

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsValidationBiggerThanMaxSetting
sentence.value: Cannot be bigger than the maximum setting ({0})

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationCommandBarHeaderOperationsInfo
sentence.value: The selected operations will be available to the PxWeb user

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationCommandBarHeaderFileformatsInfo
sentence.value: The selected file formats will be available to the PxWeb user

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationCommandBarHeaderButtonInfo
sentence.value: The selected operations will be available to the PxWeb user

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationCommandBarHeaderPresentationViewsInfo
sentence.value: The selected presentation views will be available to the PxWeb user

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationGeneralPromptNotesInfo
sentence.value: If madantory footnotes should be prompted to the user when the table is displayed

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationGeneralNewTitleLayoutInfo
sentence.value: 'New' 2020 WAG layout: Title is placed high on the page and only there (ignoring the table/Show title setting). False yields the old layout.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableStickyHeaderFullscreen
sentence.value: Lock table header in fullscreen mode

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableTransformInfo
sentence.value: If the table should be automatically transformed before it displays to the user

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableTransformSingleValueFirstAndHeaderOnlyOneMultiple
sentence.value: Only one multi valued variable in the header

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationDefaultLayoutInfo
sentence.value: The default layout to use when displaying a table to the user

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableMaxRowsInfo
sentence.value: The maximum number of rows that will be displayed within the table on screen. If the underlying data table contains more rows than what is specified in this setting, the table on screen will be cropped.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableMaxColumnsInfo
sentence.value: The maximum number of columns that will be displayed within the table on screen. If the underlying data table contains more columns than what is specified in this setting, the table on screen will be cropped.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableTitleVisibleInfo
sentence.value: If the table title shall be displayed within the table or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableDisplayAttributesInfo
sentence.value: If cell information shall be displayed in the table or not. Information displayed is attributes and notes at cell level.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsPresentationTableDisplayDefaultAttributesInfo
sentence.value: If the default values of the attributes of the table shall be displayed beneath the table or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsXMLGeneratorSelectDbInfo
sentence.value: Select one of the databases to generate the database XML file

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsXMLGeneratorSelectDbTypeInfo
sentence.value: Select the type of database to be used

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsXMLGeneratorSelectBaseURIInfo
sentence.value: Select the base URI for links in the xml file. Doesn't have to be real links.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsXMLGeneratorSelectCatalogTitleInfo
sentence.value: Select the title of the generated XML catalog

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsXMLGeneratorSelectCatalogDescInfo
sentence.value: Select the description of the generated XML catalog

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsXMLGeneratorStatusInfo
sentence.value: Status for generation of Dcat-XML file for the chosen database

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsXMLGeneratorLanguageErrorInfo
sentence.value: Chosen preferred language not available for chosen database

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsGenerateDbSelectDbInfo
sentence.value: Select one of the databases to generate the database description file

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsGenerateCnmmDbSelectDbInfo
sentence.value: Select one of the databases to generate the database description file

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsGenerateDbLanguageDependentInfo
sentence.value: Show all files despite of the selected language.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsGenerateDbSortOrderInfo
sentence.value: Select the key that will be used to create the sort order for the tables.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsGenerateDbCreateIndexInfo
sentence.value: If selected, search index creation will be automatically initiated after the database has been generated.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsGenerateDbCreateIndexInitiated
sentence.value: Search index creation has been initiated

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsLanguageManagerInfo
sentence.value: Select which language you want to edit. Key = the key that identifies a sentence in the system, Fallback = the sentence that will be used if no translation is done, Language = The sentence in the currently selected language.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsResetAllInfo
sentence.value: Reset all static lists in PxWeb

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsResetLanguageInfo
sentence.value: Reset language list in the language system

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsResetAggregationInfo
sentence.value: Releases aggregations list that is loaded into memory

sentence.name: PxWebAdminToolsResetDatabasesInfo
sentence.value: Reset the cached px databases structure

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesGeneralFeatureInfo
sentence.value: Selected features will be available in the administration tool and in PxWeb

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesGeneralClearCacheInfo
sentence.value: If specified the cache will be cleared at the specified time(s). Separate times with comma. Example: 09:30,12:00,13:49

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralFontNameInfo
sentence.value: The font used in the chart

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralFontSizeTitleInfo
sentence.value: The font size of the title of the chart

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralFontSizeAxisInfo
sentence.value: The font size of the axis of the chart

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralHeightInfo
sentence.value: Default value for the 'Height' chart user setting

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralMaxHeightInfo
sentence.value: Height of chart cannot be larger than this value

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralWidthInfo
sentence.value: Default value for the 'Width' chart user setting

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralMaxWidthInfo
sentence.value: Width of chart cannot be larger than this value

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralLineThicknessInfo
sentence.value: Default value for the 'Line thickness' chart user setting

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralMaxLineThicknessInfo
sentence.value: Line thickness cannot be larger than this value

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralLabelOrientationInfo
sentence.value: Default value for the 'Label orientation' chart user setting

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralTimeSortOrderInfo
sentence.value: Default value for the 'Time sort order' chart user setting

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralShowLegendInfo
sentence.value: Default value for the 'Show legend' chart user setting

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralLegendHeightInfo
sentence.value: Default value for the 'Legend height' chart user setting

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralLegendFontSizeInfo
sentence.value: Font size for the chart legend

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralGuidelinesColorInfo
sentence.value: Color of the gridlines in the chart

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralGuidelinesHorizontalInfo
sentence.value: Default value for the 'Horizontal gridlines' chart user setting

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralGuidelinesVerticalInfo
sentence.value: Default value for the 'Vertical gridlines' chart user setting

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralMaxValuesInfo
sentence.value: The maximum number of cells (product of all values) that can be selected when creating a chart. If the selected number of cells are larger than this value no chart will be displayed. The purpose of this setting is to spare the web server from creating very large chart which takes a lot of calculating power from the web server.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralShowSourseInfo
sentence.value: Show the source to the chart

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralLogoImgInfo
sentence.value: Select the image for the logotype in the chart.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralLineColorPhrameInfo
sentence.value: Choose the color of the border around the chart. If no line thickness is specified, then no frame.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralLineThicknessPhrameInfo
sentence.value: Select line thickness of the frame around the chart. If not specified, so there will be no frame.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralBackgroundColorGraphsInfo
sentence.value: Choose a background color to the chart.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralBackgroundColorInfo
sentence.value: Choose a background color behind the chart.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralBackgroundAlphaInfo
sentence.value: Choose alpha / transparency of the background. Must be a value between 0 and 255 where 0 is completely transparent and 255 opaque.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesChartsGeneralChartAlphaInfo
sentence.value: Choose alpha / transparency of the chart background. Must be a value between 0 and 255 where 0 is completely transparent and 255 opaque.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralApiPxDatabasesInfo
sentence.value: Defines which PX databases are accessible via the API in which languages

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralApiCnmmDatabasesInfo
sentence.value: Defines which CNMM databases are accessible via the API in which languages

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralUrlRootInfo
sentence.value: Specify URL root for API on other instance

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralUrlRootInfoV2
sentence.value: Specify URL root for API-V2 on other instance

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralEnableApiV2QueryLinkInfo
sentence.value: Enable API-V2 link in the results view

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralMaxValuesReturnedInfo
sentence.value: Maximum number of values returned from request

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralLimiterRequestsInfo
sentence.value: Maximum number of requests from a specific IP-address (works togheter with Limiter timespan)

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralLimiterTimespanInfo
sentence.value: Timespan for how many request can be made from a specific IP-address (see LimiterRequests)

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralEnableCacheInfo
sentence.value: If cacheing of requests shall be made or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralShowQueryInformationInfo
sentence.value: If enabled a information link is displayed in PX-Web in the presentation views. When the link is clicked information about how to access the current table via the API is displayed.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralShowSaveApiQueryButtonInfo
sentence.value: If enabled, button for saving API query is visible

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralSaveApiQueryTextInfo
sentence.value: Please use the istitution's abbreviation with lowercase. Example: If the text is 'ssb' then the filename will be 'ssb_table_[tableid].json'

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralFetchCellLimitInformationInfo
sentence.value: Maximum number of cells returned from request

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesApiGeneralDefaultExampleResponseFormatInfo
sentence.value: The response format that will be displayed in the API example

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsSavedQueryStorageTypeInfo
sentence.value: Defines if saved queries will be stored in files on the web server or in a database

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSavedQueryGeneralEnableCacheInfo
sentence.value: If cacheing of saved queries shall be made or not

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSavedQueryGeneralClearCacheInfo
sentence.value: If specified the cache (for Saved Query) will be cleared at the specified time(s). Separate times with comma. Example: 09:30,12:00,13:49

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSavedQueryGeneralCacheTimeInfo
sentence.value: For how long time, in minutes, should the saved query be cached.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSavedQueryGeneralShowPeriodAndIdInfo
sentence.value: Should the user see the period and id for the loaded saved query?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSavedQueryGeneralEnableLimitRequestInfo
sentence.value: Enable request limit for saved queries from a specific IP-address.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSavedQueryGeneralLimiterRequestsInfo
sentence.value: Maximum number of requests to saved queries that can be made from a specific IP-address (works togheter with Limiter timespan)

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSavedQueryGeneralLimiterTimespanInfo
sentence.value: Timespan for how many request to saved queries can be made from a specific IP-address (see LimiterRequests)

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSaveQueryGeneralSaveQueryPxDatabasesInfo
sentence.value: Defines which PX databases that will have the saved query function available

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSaveQueryGeneralSaveQueryCnmmDatabasesInfo
sentence.value: Defines which CNMM databases that will have the saved query function available

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSearchGeneralCacheTimeInfo
sentence.value: Time in minutes that the search index will be cached

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSearchGeneralResultListLengthInfo
sentence.value: Maximum number of tables that will be displayed in the search result list

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesSearchGeneralDefaultOperatorInfo
sentence.value: The operator AND/OR that will be used by default when more than one word is included in a search query

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerGeneralSleepTimeInfo
sentence.value: The time in seconds the worker process shall sleep between iterations

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerGeneralStatusInfo
sentence.value: Describes the current status of the background worker process

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerGeneralCurrentActivityInfo
sentence.value: What the background worker process is doing right now

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerConfirmStop
sentence.value: Do you want to stop the background worker process?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerConfirmStart
sentence.value: Do you want to start the background worker process?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminFeaturesBackgroundWorkerConfirmWakeUp
sentence.value: Do you want to wake up the background worker process?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsMainHeaderForTablesInfo
sentence.value: Type of heading that will be used for table pages

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsShowExternalSearchLinkInfo
sentence.value: If link to external search page shall be displayed or not. This is typically the big search on your website. Edit the PxWebExternalSearchURL sentence in the language file to match the URL of your search page.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsLanguageDefaultLanguageInfo
sentence.value: The default language for the PxWeb site

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsLanguageSiteLanguagesInfo
sentence.value: Selected languages will be available on the PxWeb site.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsLanguageDecimalSeparatorInfo
sentence.value: Character to use as decimal separator

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsLanguageThousandSeparatorInfo
sentence.value: Character to use as thousand separator

sentence.name: PxWebAdminConfirmSaveSettings
sentence.value: Do you want to save the settings?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminConfirmGenerateDb
sentence.value: Do you want to generate a new database?

sentence.name: PxWebAdminSettingsImplementedInComingVersions
sentence.value: This feature will be implemented in a coming version of PxWeb

sentence.name: UnauthorizedTableMessage
sentence.value: You are not authorized to view this table!

sentence.name: UnauthorizedDatabaseMessage
sentence.value: You are not authorized to view this database!

sentence.name: PxWebAdminUsersLoginFailure
sentence.value: Your login attempt has failed. Please try again.

sentence.name: PxWebAdminUsersAddedUser
sentence.value: has been added as a user

sentence.name: PxWebBulkInformation
sentence.value: The tables available for download contain the entire dataset and all reference periods published as statistics. The files are available in CSV format and due to the size of the files, they are packaged in ZIP format.

sentence.name: PxWebBulkLink
sentence.value: Download the entire table as csv file
